TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(object sender, ObjectDataSourceEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ObjectDataSourceEventArgs)
public delegate void ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ObjectDataSourceEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 和 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and events of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和擷取及顯示資訊的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to retrieve and display information. 在此範例中，如同許多真實世界案例中，它可能不可行或適當使用具有的商務物件的預設執行個體控制項。In this example, as in many real-world scenarios, it might not be possible or appropriate to use a default instance of the business object with the control. 在此範例中，成功無法呼叫預設建構函式，因為它將會擲回例外狀況。In this example, the cannot successfully call the default constructor because it will throw an exception. 在某些情況下，預設建構函式可能會受到保護，並在其他它可能會初始化為所需狀態的商務物件。In some cases, the default constructor might be protected, and in others it might not initialize the business object to a desired state. 不論原因，您可以具現化商務物件自己，並將執行個體設定屬性傳遞至處理常式的物件。Whatever the reason, you can instantiate the business object yourself and set the instance to the property of the object that is passed to the handler. 這是商務物件的執行個體將用來執行其工作。This is the business object instance that the will use to perform its work. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/objds15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/objds15vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用上述範例中的範例基本商務物件。The following code example demonstrates the example basic business object used in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/CS/northwindemployee15.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_15/VB/northwindemployee15.vb#2)]
